text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Burial space" means land or space in a structure used or to be used for burial.
"Burial space" includes a burial right in the land or space.

text.section: "Buyer" means a person who buys preneed goods or preneed services.
"Preneed burial contract" means a written instrument under which preneed goods or preneed services are to be sold and delivered or performed.

section.section:
"Preneed services" means services that are sold:
before the buyer's death; and
in connection with burial or cremation.
"Preneed services" includes opening and closing a grave.

text.section: "Seller" means a registered cemeterian, registered crematory operator, registered seller, or any other person who sells preneed goods or preneed services.
"Specific funds" means money that is identified to a specific preneed burial contract.
"Trust account" means a preneed trust account.
